meta.title: YetiFace Games - Indie Games
meta.description: Experience the thrilling world of YetiFace - an episodic psychological horror game series featuring untold stories. Play through multiple episodes of suspense and mystery.

modals.title: Privacy Policy
content: We do not collect or sell personal data.
We do not use analytics or tracking cookies.
We store only your theme preference in your browser's localStorage so the site remembers your choice.
If fonts/icons are loaded from a CDN, those providers receive your IP address to deliver the files.

modals.title: Terms of Service
content: This site is provided "as is" without warranties of any kind.
Links to third‑party sites are provided for convenience; we are not responsible for their content.

modals.title: Cookie Policy
content: We do not use cookies for analytics, advertising, or tracking.
We store only your theme preference in localStorage (not a cookie) so the site remembers dark/light mode.
Third‑party CDNs used for fonts/icons may receive your IP address to deliver assets; this does not set cookies on our site.
If we ever introduce cookies that are not strictly necessary, we will update this notice and ask for your consent.

items.heading: Hollowbrook Appartments
text: Hollowbrook is a stylized horror experience told through multiple episodes.
Each chapter immerses you in the life of a new character, blending personal backstories with chilling encounters that react to your decisions.

items.heading: We're working on the next game!
What is YetiFace?
text: Indie dev based in Wales, UK.
Creating short episodic psychological horror games revealing untold stories.
